Practical Tips for Responding to Those Affected by Human-Trafficking

Listen into this conversation between Abigail Mills, social justice manager with Northland’s CARE Center and Pastor Kevin Urichko as they discuss practical tips for responding to those affected by human trafficking. They briefly address how to respond to victims of trauma or sex trafficking as well as those on the demand-side who are trapped in sexual addiction. This is specifically designed for those serving on Prayer and Pastoral Care teams during that JuST Faith Summit and weekend worship services, April 20-25.
